trans-unit.source: On top of that are several packages that deal with classical notation, MIDI (sequencing, loading and saving), MusicXML, ASCII tablature, and many other useful and plain cool things like LilyPond and FluidSynth support. Everything is fully documentated, put into simple APIs and has a tutorial making it easy to jump straight in.
trans-unit.target: 除此之外,还有一些处理古典符号、MIDI(排序、加载和保存)、MusicXML、ASCII tablature的软件包,以及许多其他有用的和简单的很酷的东西,如LilyPond和FluidSynth支持。所有的东西都有完整的文档,放入简单的API中,并且有一个教程,让你很容易直接跳进去。

trans-unit.source: mingus is a music package for Python

mingus is a package for Python used by programmers, musicians, composers and researchers to make and investigate music. At the core of mingus is music theory, which includes topics like intervals, chords, scales and progressions. These components are rigurously tested and can be used to generate and recognize musical elements using convenient shorthand where possible (for example some acceptable chords are: CM7, Am6, Ab7, G7).
trans-unit.target: mingus是Python的一个软件包,程序员、音乐家、作曲家和研究人员都可以使用它来制作和研究音乐。mingus 的核心是音乐理论,其中包括音程、和弦、音阶和进行曲等主题。这些组件都经过严格的测试,可以尽可能使用方便的速记来生成和识别音乐元素(例如一些可接受的和弦有:CM7、Am6、Ab7、G7)。
